titleStmt.title: The devil's oak: or, His ramble in a tempestuous night Where he happen'd to discourse with men of several callings of his own colour and complexion. To a very pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for C. Bates, at the Sun and Bible in Pye-corner,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "And the devil he was weather-beat,".
Reproduction of the original in the Glasgow University Library.
